name: Two Ways
description:
Keep dodging blocks falling from above!
The most difficult action game which makes you glue to the screen is now released!
How long can you hold out against endless waves of blocks?

It is easy to play this game. Just tap the screen from side to side and control the character.
Capture and share your gameplay video!
Share your best record and compete with your friends!

[How to play]
- Tap left or right side on the screen to move the character from side to side.
- Choose a game level from EASY, NORMAL and HARD.
Note: HARD level becomes available after using coins which can be obtained by playing the game.

[Features]
- Sharing your best record Twitter, Facebook, LINE, etc.
- Capturing and sharing your gameplay video.
